relevant_findings.general: no apparent distress, lying in bed resting comfortably
relevant_findings.neck: supple, JVD at 12cm at 45 degrees, c/d/I bandage over previous tracheostomy site that appears well healing
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: regular rate S1 and S2 heart sounds, transmitted LVAD sounds. Sternotomy site is well-healing
relevant_findings.abdomen: soft, non-distended, tender in left quadrants. No rebound tenderness. Drive line is c/d/I. Not tender near drive line.
